class.name: org.genedb.db.hibernate3gen.CvTermSynonym
class.comment: A cvterm actually represents a distinct class or concept. A concept can be refered to by different phrases or names. In addition to the primary name (cvterm.name) there can be a number of alternative aliases or synonyms. For example, -T cell- as a synonym for -T lymphocyte-

column.name: type_id
column.comment: A synonym can be exact, narrow or borader than
